content.rendered:
• Social media management for B2B brands (Mid-level companies), social media ad campaigns.
  • Minimum $500/m budget handled.
  • Experience in handling US based campaigns.
  • Experience in creating Social media calendar & execution.
  • Excellent writing skills. Experienced in Linkedin, FB, Insta, and other SM platforms.
